subject: Re: [junit] Eclipse Plugin Testing using Junit
msgSnippet: Hi Srimaan, I assume that your question regards the Eclipse plugins. To write a JUnit Plug-in Test do the same procedures as for an ordinary plugin. Then
messageBody:
Hi Srimaan,

I assume that your question regards the Eclipse plugins. To write a
JUnit Plug-in Test do the same procedures as for an ordinary plugin.
Then declare the JUnit plugin and the plugin you want to test as a
dependencies for the Test Plug-in. Then run the TestCase by invoking
Run As JUnit Plug-in Test.

Before I had problems with this issue and the Eclipse newsgroups were
more useful to me, especially
news://news.eclipse.org/eclipse.tools.jdt.

--
Ferad Zyulkyarov
Dokuz Eylul University
Dept. Of Computer Engineering
